original_text: Then said Hushai unto Zadok and to Abiathar the priests, Thus and thus did Ahithophel counsel Absalom and the elders of Israel; and thus and thus have I counselled.
korean_text: 이에 후새가 사독과 아비아달 두 제사장에게 이르되 아히도벨이 압살롬과 이스라엘 장로들에게 이러이러하게 계략을 세웠고 나도 이러이러하게 계략을 세웠으니

sentences.original_text: unto Zadok and to Abiathar priests
Thus and thus did Ahithophel counsel
Absalom and the elders of Israel
and thus and thus have I counselled
